application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) details of service runs, including hot and cold water runs, for all the proposed kitchens; b) Details of the installation of the partition beside staircase at upper landing between second and third floor levels, and how the staircase would be retained and protected, including detailed section and elevation drawings; c) Detailed elevation and section drawings (1:20) of all replacement doors and confirmation for all doors to be fully constructed of timber with recessed moulding; d) details of associated architectural details, including cornices, skirtings, architraves and lighting, including detailed elevation and section drawings) of Listed Building consent LB/24/06355 (Internal alterations on first, second and third floor, with removal of WC and associated sanitary fittings, internal modern lightweight partitions, and relocation of kitchen to rear rooms of respective floor level)
